blogPost.excerpt: SEED makes it painless for teams to use serverless. -- 🤖 Zero-config deployments for Serverless Framework and CDK apps, no build scripts needed 💫 Custom deployment infrastructure for 100x faster deployments 🖥️ And a dashboard to manage your environments
blogPost.body: SEED makes it painless for teams to use serverless. -- 🤖 Zero-config deployments for Serverless Framework and CDK apps, no build scripts needed 💫 Custom deployment infrastructure for 100x faster deployments 🖥️ And a dashboard to manage your environments
blogPost.title: SEED - 100x faster serverless deployments
blogPost.author: Lindsay Wiese-Amos

localize.description: SEED让团队使用serverless变得不费吹灰之力。-- 🤖 零配置部署Serverless Framework和CDK应用程序，无需构建脚本 💫 自定义部署基础设施，使部署速度提高100倍 🖥️ 还有一个仪表板来管理你的环境。
localize.tagline: 无服务器部署速度提高100倍

localize.description: SEED讓團隊使用serverless變得不費吹灰之力。-- 🤖 零配置部署Serverless Framework和CDK應用程序，無需構建腳本 💫 自定義部署基礎設施，使部署速度提高100倍 🖥️ 還有一個儀表板來管理你的環境。
localize.tagline: 無服務器部署速度提高100倍

previous.excerpt: Waldo is the world’s first no-code testing platform that lets anyone create reliable, automated mobile tests without the hassle of scripting. Forget scripting your mobile tests, use waldo. Now available for Android!
previous.title: Waldo for Android - No-code mobile testing that works

localize.description: Waldo是世界上第一个无代码测试平台，让任何人都可以创建可靠的、自动化的移动测试，而无需编写脚本的麻烦。忘记您的移动测试脚本，使用Waldo。现在可以在Android上使用
Waldo是世界上第一個無代碼測試平臺，讓任何人都可以創建可靠的、自動化的移動測試，而無需編寫腳本的麻煩。忘記您的移動測試腳本，使用Waldo。現在可以在Android上使用
